document.full_text: arizona's republican governor jan brewer on monday vetoed two controversial bills, one mandating proof of u.s. citizenship to run for president, the other allowing guns on college campuses, in a clear setback for conservatives who control the state legislature.
document.title: arizona governor vetoes birther, campus gun bills
lines_and_colors: arizona's republican governor jan brewer on monday vetoed two controversial bills, one mandating proof of u.s. citizenship to run for president, the other allowing guns on college campuses, in a clear setback for conservatives who control the state legislature.
